title: Microsoft’s WSUS Patch Causes Hotpatching Failures on Windows Server 2025

content.raw: Microsoft has acknowledged a critical issue affecting Windows Server 2025 systems enrolled in the Hotpatch program. A recent Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) patch was inadvertently distributed to machines configured to receive Hotpatch updates, causing disruptions to the seamless patching process that allows security updates without requiring system restarts. Distribution Error Impacts Hotpatch-Enrolled Systems The […] The post Microsoft’s WSUS Patch Causes Hotpatching Failures on Windows Server 2025 appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
